title: WhatsApp रात 11:30 से सुबह 6 बजे तक बंद रहेगा? जानें क्या है सच्चाई
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Earlier today, some people and businesses experienced trouble uploading or sending images, videos and other files on our apps and platforms. The issue has since been resolved and we should be back at 100% for everyone. We're sorry for any inconvenience.
